actions.name: Lifestream
actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves Geomancy.

Effect: All allies gain the Resolution Effect of the triggering attack.

actions.name: Lifestream (Faint)
actions.description: Passive: The first time the user would gain @Affliction[fainted] in combat, it does not and recovers 8 Ticks of HP and is cured of all Status Afflictions.

actions.name: Geomancy
actions.description:
Effect: Set-up: The user begins to glow with mystical power, gaining @Affliction[braced] 1 and healing 3 Ticks of HP.

Resolution: The user gains +2 SPATK, SPDEF, and SPD Stages for 7 activations.
